linesOfText.text:
Red lives with her dad
on a busy street
in a big city,

One day,
Grandma has a surprise for Red.

She runs down the stairs,
bursts out the door, and races...

Red looks up as she lies crashed
on the sidewalk.

She hears an excited voice say...

"Thanks, I think I'm all right," replies Red.

I'm just going in here to see my Grandma."

Red stands up,
slowly collects her skateboard,
and drags her legs up the stairs
to Grandma's house.

"Hi," Red calls as she reaches
Grandma's open door.

Her head aches and she needs
a BIG Grandma hug.

"Come on in," replies a strange,
muffled voice.
'Grandma' is sitting in her favorite chair.

"All the better to umm...
see you with, my dear,"
mutters 'Grandma'.

"And what a big nose you have,"
Red breathes.

"All the better to smell you with
my dear," comes the reply.

"And look at those

"All the better to eat you with,"
whispers BB Wolf.

As she flees,
Red kicks her skateboard
and it shoots across the floor.

A moment later, Grandma
enters her living room.

"Hello, Red. I had an e-mail
to send, so I left the front
door open for you. How
was your day, darling?"
Red never saw BB Wolf again.

She moved into the apartment
with Red and Dad.

And they all lived happily
together, sharing their
many adventures,
through the days,
months and
years.

Betty lives in Australia,
about here...
She has always loved the color

When she was five, Betty wrote and
drew a story about a roller-skating
mouse ... it is filled with bad
spelling ... yet she still loves it.
